ROCAD Construction Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ na Naijiria, nke R&R Group
A maara ya maka iwu ụfọdụ akụrụngwa, okporo ụzọ na àkwà mmiri nke Naịjirịa.
ROCAD Construction Limited webatara 2002, ndị otu ntọala Ronaldo Minaise na Roger Farajallah.
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2002, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ rụrụ ọrụ owuwu mbụ ya na Nigeria - ịrụ akwa akwa Kudaru nke jikọtara Kano na steeti Kaduna.
